strapiPost.title: Nothing Like the Symphony
strapiPost.content:
The Symphony of Northwest Arkansas (SONA) recently announced its 2021-22 season with 6 performances starting in November.

  • Sound of music: The pandemic hit the mute button on SONA's 2020-21 season, but that's not stopping classically innovative sounds from spilling out of the symphony.
  • For the next song: From Mozart and Beethoven to Majestic Mahler, each performance brings a unique blend of instruments and symphonies that celebrates what SONA has learned over the last year.

You can listen to what SONA has in store for its 2021-22 season HERE.
